text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose

calm
you
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 127 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
nonchalant let's find out what it means
and how you can use it in your daily
conversation nonchalant have you ever
been indifferent towards something it
could be a serious problem or some bad
news you have just heard from a friend
it doesn't bother you
neither affects you in any manner you
actually remain very calm the word
nonchalant basically means to be calm
relaxed and remain totally unaffected
when you are totally unconcerned
indifferent and negligent about
something you are nonchalant you are
disinterested showing no excitement fear
anxiety or any other emotion you have a
complete carefree attitude and nothing
seems to worry you
for example if you win a quiz contest
that you never thought you would you are
not excited and display no emotions on
the contrary you are quite calm and cool
about it you are almost indifferent
towards it it means you are not chill
and about winning the contest the word
nonchalant is an adjective as it
describes someone or something of being
calm and indifferent the word
nonchalance is a noun
and the word nonchalantly is an adverb
okay now that you know what nonchalant
means let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation example 1
Christine is always nonchalant while
addressing a large audience she presents
with great ease example 2 after giving a
pep talk to his team the coach told them
to be nonchalant just before the final
match started example 3 lisa was
nonchalant when her mother expressed how
annoyed she was with Lisa's behavior
example for her nonchalance towards
repeated warning for reporting late to
work finally cost Patricia her job
example 5 even though mark was nervous
while proposing marriage to his
girlfriend he tried to appear nonchalant
about it
example 6 when the doctor was informing
about her serious health problem mrs.
Williams listened nonchalantly to keep
up a brave front example 7 the
nonchalant toddler was asleep for long
hours while his mother was away at work
example eight due to Peters nonchalance
and recklessness throughout the year he
requested his computer professor to
solve his queries a day before his exam
example nine Kelly was very confident
and nonchalant during her first
interview with a prestigious financial
company that's the end of today's
episode do you behave nonchalantly with
any of your friends or colleagues kindly
share your experiences in the comment
box below this video thank you for
watching us do watch all the episodes of
daily video vocabulary to better your
English language skills do subscribe to
our Channel and stay updated with all
the latest lessons I will see you again
tomorrow with a new word or a phrase
till then bye and take care
